title: New & Video: The National – Exile, Vilify
body: On June 15th [Valve](http://www.valvesoftware.com/), the makers of video game [Portal 2](http://www.thinkwithportals.com/), teamed up with **The National** in running a [video contest](http://www.thinkwithportals.com/videocontest/) for the band’s new song _Exile, Vilify_, which features in the game. As of today, a winner has been found in one [C.F. Meister](http://cfmeister.tumblr.com/), who has created a video that has nothing to do with the game at all, but rather features, and I quote, ‘the world’s saddest sock puppet’. Fitting, then.
